analyzed: zas skom gos nor mu tig nor bu dbyig / rgyan gser rin chen sna tshogs bee d'urya //
translated: Food, drink, clothes, jewels, pearls, and wealth, ornaments, gold, and various precious gems, and lapis lazuli.

original: de dag bsams ma thag tu grub gyur cig /'jig rten gang na'ang sdug bsngal sgra ma byung //
analyzed: de dag bsams ma thag tu grub gyur cig /'jig rten gang na'ang sdug bsngal sgra ma byung //
translated: May they be produced as soon as they are thought of, and may the sound of suffering not exist anywhere in the world.

original: sems can gcig kyang mi 'phrod mthong ma gyur //
analyzed: sems can gcig kyang mi 'phrod mthong ma gyur //
translated: May no sentient being see anything unpleasant.🔽May all of them have a vast complexion,🔽and may they shine with light.

original: de dag thams cad kha dog rgya chen dang // phan tshun du ni 'od byed gyur par shog / mi yi 'jig rten phun sum tshogs gang yod //
analyzed: de dag thams cad kha dog rgya chen dang // phan tshun du ni 'od byed gyur par shog / mi yi 'jig rten phun sum tshogs gang yod //
translated: May whatever excellence exists in the world of humans

original: de dag bsam par de dag skye bar gyur //
analyzed: de dag bsam par de dag skye bar gyur //
translated: be produced in accordance with their thoughts.🔽May all their thoughts be fulfilled

original: bsam pa thams cad bsams ma thag tu yang //
analyzed: bsam pa thams cad bsams ma thag tu yang //
translated: as soon as they are thought.

original: bsod nams 'bras bu yongs su rdzogs par shog / spos dang phreng ba dag dang byug pa dang // gos dang phye ma me tog sna tshogs dang // ljon shing dag las dus gsum 'bab par shog / sems can de dag len cing dgar gyur cig / de bzhin gshegs pa bsam yas thams cad dang //
analyzed: bsod nams 'bras bu yongs su rdzogs par shog / spos dang phreng ba dag dang byug pa dang // gos dang phye ma me tog sna tshogs dang // ljon shing dag las dus gsum 'bab par shog / sems can de dag len cing dgar gyur cig / de bzhin gshegs pa bsam yas thams cad dang //
translated: and may those beings take them and be delighted.🔽May they make offerings in the ten directions🔽to all the inconceivable tathagatas,🔽to the perfect bodhisattvas and shravakas,

original: rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos dang // rdul bral dri med bstan pa'i chos la yang //
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos dang // rdul bral dri med bstan pa'i chos la yang //
translated: and to the immaculate Dharma of the teachings.🔽May they abandon all inferior states of being,🔽may they transcend the eight disadvantageous states,🔽may they attain the supreme freedom of the human life of leisure,

original: phyogs bcu rnams su mchod pa byed par shog /'gro ba dman pa thams cad spong gyur cig / mi khom brgyad po dag las 'das par shog / dal ba'i rgyal po dam pa thob gyur cig / rtag tu sangs rgyas 'grogs pa thob par shog / rtag tu
analyzed: phyogs bcu rnams su mchod pa byed par shog /'gro ba dman pa thams cad spong gyur cig / mi khom brgyad po dag las 'das par shog / dal ba'i rgyal po dam pa thob gyur cig / rtag tu sangs rgyas 'grogs pa thob par shog / rtag tu
translated: and may they always be in the presence of the buddhas.

original: mtho ba'i rigs su skye bar shog / nor dang 'bru yis mdzod rnams 'byor gyur cig / snyan dang grags dang gzugs dang kha dog gis //
analyzed: mtho ba'i rigs su skye bar shog / nor dang 'bru yis mdzod rnams 'byor gyur cig / snyan dang grags dang gzugs dang kha dog gis //
translated: fame, renown, beauty, and complexion.

original: bskal pa du mar legs par brgyan par shog / bud med thams cad rtag tu phor gyur te //
analyzed: bskal pa du mar legs par brgyan par shog / bud med thams cad rtag tu phor gyur te //
translated: May all women always become men,🔽courageous, heroic, and wise.

original: dpa' zhing rtul phod mkhas shing gsal bar shog / de kun rtag tu byang chub phyir spyod gyur //
analyzed: dpa' zhing rtul phod mkhas shing gsal bar shog / de kun rtag tu byang chub phyir spyod gyur //
translated: May they always practice for the sake of awakening,

original: pha rol phyin pa drug la spyod par shog / phyogs bcu dag na rin chen shing dbang drung //
analyzed: pha rol phyin pa drug la spyod par shog / phyogs bcu dag na rin chen shing dbang drung //
translated: and may they practice the six perfections.🔽May they see the buddhas sitting

original: sangs rgyas bde bzhugs rin chen bee d'urya'i //
analyzed: sangs rgyas bde bzhugs rin chen bee d'urya'i //
translated: on lion thrones of precious beryl🔽in the ten directions,🔽and may they hear the teachings they give.

original: khri la bzhugs pa dag ni mthong gyur cig / chos bstan pa yang de dag thos par shog / bdag gis sdig @309a * //🔽pa'i las rnams bsgrubs pa ni //
analyzed: khri la bzhugs pa dag ni mthong gyur cig / chos bstan pa yang de dag thos par shog / bdag gis sdig @309a * // pa'i las rnams bsgrubs pa ni //
translated: Whatever bad actions I have done

original: srid pa nyam ngar sngon chad gang bsgrubs pa //
analyzed: srid pa nyam ngar sngon chad gang bsgrubs pa //
translated: and whatever I have accumulated in my previous existences🔽in the terrifying wilderness of cyclic existence,

original: sdig las gang dag mi 'dod 'bras thob pa //
analyzed: sdig las gang dag mi 'dod 'bras thob pa //
translated: may I alone experience the results of those evil actions.

original: dge ba thams cad ma lus zad gyur cig / sems can gang dag srid par bcings gnas kun //
analyzed: dge ba thams cad ma lus zad gyur cig / sems can gang dag srid par bcings gnas kun //
translated: All those beings who are bound in the prison of existence,

original: 'khor ba'i zhags pa'i thag pas dam bcings pa //
analyzed: 'khor ba'i zhags pa'i thag pas dam bcings pa //
translated: Bound by the rope of the noose of saṃsāra,🔽May their bonds be loosened by the hand of wisdom,🔽And may they be liberated and attain freedom from suffering!🔽Those beings in this world of Jambudvīpa,

original: shes rab lag gis bcings pa bkrol bar shog / sdug bsngal rnams las thar gyur thob gyur cig / sems can gang dag 'dzam bu'i gling 'di dang // gang dag 'jig rten khams ni gzhan rnams na //
analyzed: shes rab lag gis bcings pa bkrol bar shog / sdug bsngal rnams las thar gyur thob gyur cig / sems can gang dag 'dzam bu'i gling 'di dang // gang dag 'jig rten khams ni gzhan rnams na //
translated: And those in other world systems,

original: bsod nams sna tshogs zab mo rnams byed pa //
analyzed: bsod nams sna tshogs zab mo rnams byed pa //
translated: Who create various profound merits,

original: de dag kun la rjes su yi rang ngo //
analyzed: de dag kun la rjes su yi rang ngo //
translated: I rejoice in all of them!🔽By the merit of this rejoicing,

original: lus dang ngag dang yid kyis bsgrub pa yi //🔽bdag gi rjes su yi rang bsod nams des //
analyzed: lus dang ngag dang yid kyis bsgrub pa yi // bdag gi rjes su yi rang bsod nams des //
translated: Which is accomplished through body, speech, and mind,🔽May my aspirations bear fruit,🔽And may I attain stainless, unsurpassed enlightenment!🔽Those who are always free from stains,

original: bdag gi smon lam 'bras bu yod par shog / byang chub rdul bral bla med thob gyur cig / gang dag rtag tu dri ma bral ba dang // dri med yid kyi phyag 'tshal bstod pa dang // yongs su bsngo ba brjod pa 'di yis ni //
analyzed: bdag gi smon lam 'bras bu yod par shog / byang chub rdul bral bla med thob gyur cig / gang dag rtag tu dri ma bral ba dang // dri med yid kyi phyag 'tshal bstod pa dang // yongs su bsngo ba brjod pa 'di yis ni //
translated: And with stainless minds offer praise and make dedications with this recitation,

original: bskal ba drug cur ngan song spong bar 'gyur //
analyzed: bskal ba drug cur ngan song spong bar 'gyur //
translated: And for sixty eons will avoid the lower realms.

original: tshigs su bcad pa brjod pa 'di dag gis //
analyzed: tshigs su bcad pa brjod pa 'di dag gis //
translated: By these verses

original: skyes pa bud med bram ze rgyal rigs las //
analyzed: skyes pa bud med bram ze rgyal rigs las //
translated: Men, women, brahmins, and kṣatriyas

original: thal sbyar 'dug ste rgyal ba gang bstod pa //
analyzed: thal sbyar 'dug ste rgyal ba gang bstod pa //
translated: Who join their palms and praise the Victor

original: tshe rabs kun tu skye ba dran par 'gyur //
analyzed: tshe rabs kun tu skye ba dran par 'gyur //
translated: Will remember their births in all lives.

original: yan lag dbang po kun gyis yan lag brgyan //
analyzed: yan lag dbang po kun gyis yan lag brgyan //
translated: They will be adorned with all major and minor body parts,

original: bsod nams yon tan sna tshogs rnams dang ldan //
analyzed: bsod nams yon tan sna tshogs rnams dang ldan //
translated: And will have various merits and good qualities.

original: mi dbang rgyal po rtag tu de mchod de //
analyzed: mi dbang rgyal po rtag tu de mchod de //
translated: Kings and lords of men will always make offerings to them,

original: de dang de dag tu ni de 'drar 'gyur //
analyzed: de dang de dag tu ni de 'drar 'gyur //
translated: And they will become like that in those and other ways.

original: gang dag rna ba'i bu gar bshags pa 'di ni grag 'gyur ba //
analyzed: gang dag rna ba'i bu gar bshags pa 'di ni grag 'gyur ba //
translated: Those in whose ear-holes this confession resounds

original: de dag sangs rgyas gcig gi gan nas dge ba byas ma yin //
analyzed: de dag sangs rgyas gcig gi gan nas dge ba byas ma yin //
translated: Have not created virtue in the presence of one buddha,

original: gnyis las ma yin bzhi las ma yin lnga min bcu la min //
analyzed: gnyis las ma yin bzhi las ma yin lnga min bcu la min //
translated: Not in two, not in four, not in five, not in ten,

original: de ltar sangs rgyas stong gi gan nas dge ba byas pa yin //
analyzed: de ltar sangs rgyas stong gi gan nas dge ba byas pa yin //
translated: But in this way have created virtue in the presence of a thousand buddhas.

original: 'di dag gang gis thos pa de dag thams cad bsod nams kyi phung po rgya chen po dang ldan pa dang / skye bo mang po la phan pa dang bde bas tshim par byed de //
analyzed: 'di dag gang gis thos pa de dag thams cad bsod nams kyi phung po rgya chen po dang ldan pa dang / skye bo mang po la phan pa dang bde bas tshim par byed de //
translated: Those who hear these will all possess a vast heap of merit, and will satisfy many beings with benefit and happiness.

original: sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ba shes par gyis shig /'di lta bu'i spyod pa khyad par can dang ldan pa 'di dag ni /
analyzed: sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ba shes par gyis shig /'di lta bu'i spyod pa khyad par can dang ldan pa 'di dag ni /
translated: Know that all their obscurations will be purified. Those who possess such special conduct

original: sngon 'das pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dag la bstod pa dang / @309b smon lam rgya chen po btab pa'i rgyu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis de dag thos pa yin no //
analyzed: sngon 'das pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dag la bstod pa dang / @309b smon lam rgya chen po btab pa'i rgyu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis de dag thos pa yin no //
translated: have heard this in the past through the causes of praising the Thus-Gone Ones and making vast aspirations, and through the blessings of the Thus-Gone Ones.

analyzed: 'phags pa gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las gsungs pa'i smon lam rdzogs so /
